text: Cng sxd mux khxng cea kheapi nı xk seux khxng cea man ca xxk ma khaw prascak xantray dı «læa cng xea mux næb taw cea wi pheux hı khlay khwam tkcı dangnan nan khux hlakthan thang sxng cak phracea khxng cea pi yang fir xea nˌ læa bukhkhl chan hawhna khxng khea thæcring phwk khea pen hmu chn phu fafun
